attributes.action: SAY NO to backland developments and to remove our precious back gardens from the 'brownfield' site definition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ruination of our back gardens by greedy garden grabbers (even the greedy home owner looking for a quick income) is becoming more common.  Local councils are finding it increasingly more difficult to refuse permission if the proposals meet certain criteria.  Greedy garden grabbers make a quick buck and run - it can vastly spoil the existing neighbourhood and existing gardens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
